data.Name: YOTEL Amsterdam
data.Description: YOTEL Amsterdam offers a luxurious experience with its Premium Double Room. Enjoy modern amenities and a stunning view of Amsterdam Noord.
data.CustomerFeedback: Fantastic stay at YOTEL! The room was comfortable, and the service was excellent. Will definitely come back.

data.Name: Multatuli Hotel
data.Description: Multatuli Hotel, located in the heart of Amsterdam City Center, provides a comfortable Double Room for a pleasant stay.
data.CustomerFeedback: Great location and friendly staff at Multatuli Hotel. The Double Room was clean and cozy. Highly recommended!

data.Name: nhow Amsterdam Rai
data.Type: nhow Double or Twin Room with View
data.Description: Experience breathtaking views from nhow Amsterdam Rai's Double or Twin Room with View. A perfect blend of comfort and style.
data.CustomerFeedback: The view from our room was amazing! nhow Amsterdam Rai exceeded our expectations. Will definitely return!
data.image_url: ../src/Images/nhow Double or Twin Room with View.jpg

data.Name: Motel One Amsterdam
data.Description: Motel One Amsterdam offers a cozy Double Room in the charming area of Zuideramstel. Perfect for a relaxing stay.
data.CustomerFeedback: Had a wonderful time at Motel One! The staff was friendly, and the Double Room was comfortable. Would stay again!

data.Name: INNSiDE by Meliá Amsterdam
data.Description: Indulge in luxury at INNSiDE by Meliá Amsterdam. The Innside Guestroom offers a stylish and sophisticated accommodation.
data.CustomerFeedback: Impressive stay at INNSiDE! The Innside Guestroom was elegant, and the service was top-notch. Highly recommended!

data.Name: Eden Hotel Amsterdam
data.Description: Discover comfort in the heart of Amsterdam City Center at Eden Hotel. The Small Double Room offers a cozy retreat.
data.CustomerFeedback: Eden Hotel exceeded expectations! The Small Double Room was charming, and the location was perfect. Will come back!

data.Name: citizenM Amsterdam South
data.Description: Experience modern luxury at citizenM Amsterdam South. The King Room offers a spacious and stylish accommodation.
data.CustomerFeedback: Amazing stay at citizenM! The King Room was fantastic, and the amenities were impressive. Will definitely return!

data.Name: The Alfred Hotel
data.Description: The Alfred Hotel, situated in Oud Zuid, provides a comfortable and affordable Standard Double Room for a pleasant stay.
data.CustomerFeedback: Enjoyed my time at The Alfred Hotel! The Standard Double Room was clean and cozy. Good value for money.

data.Name: Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht - a concept by Hyatt
data.Description: Indulge in luxury at Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht. The Observatory King room offers unparalleled views and opulent comfort.
data.CustomerFeedback: Andaz Amsterdam is a gem! The Observatory King room and the views were extraordinary. An unforgettable experience!

data.Name: Hyatt Regency Amsterdam
data.Description: Experience luxury and comfort at Hyatt Regency Amsterdam. The Twin Room provides a stylish and relaxing retreat.
data.CustomerFeedback: Hyatt Regency exceeded expectations! The Twin Room was spacious, and the service was impeccable. Would stay again!

data.Name: NH Collection Amsterdam Flower Market
data.Description: NH Collection Amsterdam Flower Market offers a Superior Double or Twin Room for a luxurious and memorable stay in the city center.
data.CustomerFeedback: NH Collection is fantastic! The Superior Room was elegant, and the location was perfect. Will recommend to friends!

data.Name: ibis Styles Amsterdam Central Station
data.Description: Enjoy a cozy stay at ibis Styles Amsterdam Central Station. The Small Double Room offers comfort and convenience.
data.CustomerFeedback: Great experience at ibis Styles! The Small Double Room was charming, and the staff was friendly. Would stay again!
